_sText:
Bhop_Spacewalk

MAP TRAILER!

Bhop_spacewalk is a bunnyhop adventure type map dedicated to one of my favorite musical artists: Lemon Jelly! It also features ideas such as the climbing tower and this map's ending from the Half-Life mod "Hazardous Course 2" by Richman. It's one of my all time favorite mods, highly recommend it! You may have noticed the map uses mat_fullbright 1.  This is because of a couple of reasons, being that I couldn't compile the RAD due to maximum brush surfaces being reached, and if it does compile, the custom skybox will make everything pitch black regardless of any lighting.  So please try to enjoy it for what it is! Please not that I designed this map to be quite difficult, and I tried to use some unique level design as well for the course. Also there are 4 secrets to be found, and some are extremely hard to find so well done if you figure them all out! The map also features 6 Lemon Jelly songs and 5 other fantastic songs as well. This is also my first real in-depth map so any constructive criticism helps. :) Also I know that the file size is so large, It's mainly due to the music in the map. Make sure to check out the trailer too see the map in action!


Music Used

  • Space Walk - Lemon Jelly
  • Miles and Miles - Mint Royale
  • Come - Lemon Jelly
  • Homeward Journey - Nujabes / Uyama Hiroto
  • Space Loungin' - Shing02 / Bajune Tobeta
  • Music Sounds Better With You - Stardust
  • Princess (Ver. 2) - Mint Royale
  • The Staunton Lick - Lemon Jelly
  • Elements - Lemon Jelly
  • Stay With You - Lemon Jelly
  • Nice Weather for Ducks - Lemon Jelly

Thank you for playing!
